name: Infestation Z
description:
Your mission is to clear out the local township which has been infected with zombies. Kill zombies, earn money, die & repeat until you have survived every wave of zombies. Each time you die, you can use the money that you earned to purchase new weapons, perks and more ammo to help you fight of the horde. 

More information on the project. 

This game was created during my final semester of my university degree. The aim of this project was to create a game that would expand upon my portfolio of work. With all my previous projects being made in unity, I wanted to try making a game with the Unreal engine. At the end of the 7 week project, this is the result (during the semester I had three other units that I was studying as well, so this project wasn't my only focus during those 7 weeks). 

While the game can easily be expanded upon (by adding in new guns, zombies, perks or even more levels), I probably will leave this project as complete and move onto more projects that I want to work on.  

If you want to keep up with any projects that I am working on, follow my twitter (@the94Gamer).
